ygData.subject: Re: Beachcomber and Redhot
ygData.msgSnippet: Beachcomber nodded. Then we can move out. I need to find some friends, and maybe we can find a place for decent repairs. he says, transforming into his Dune

Beachcomber nodded. "Then we can move out. I need to find some friends,
and maybe we can find a place for decent repairs." he says, transforming
into his Dune Buggy mode. He began off slowly, so Redhot could keep up
in robot mode.
